description:
Talking Ben is an online viral character and mobile app that allows you to interact with a virtual pet named Ben the cat. While the core Talking Ben mobile app and games are focused on mobile platforms, there are also some PC options to interact with Talking Ben:

1. Talking Tom and Ben PC - This is an official PC port of the Talking Tom and Ben mobile games. It allows you to play with both Talking Tom the tiger and Talking Ben the cat on your computer. You can feed, play with and interact with the virtual pets in similar ways as the mobile apps.

2. BlueStacks Emulator - You can install and run the official Talking Ben mobile app on an Android emulator for PC like BlueStacks. This essentially lets you use the mobile app experience on your computer.

3. Online Games - There are a number of online flash games and websites featuring Talking Ben where you can play and interact with the cat character directly in your web browser. These tend to be more basic but still offer a PC Talking Ben experience.

4. Unofficial Fangames - There are some unofficial PC fan games that were inspired by Talking Ben but developed independently. These offer alternative ways to interact with Ben on your computer. However they are not officially endorsed by the original Talking Ben developers.

So while the core Talking Ben experience is focused on mobile apps, there are still a few viable options to play with and interact with Talking Ben on your PC. The official port and emulators provide the most authentic experiences, while online flash games and fan games offer more basic interactions in your web browser.
